fields.Title: VILLAGE / JOYCE
fields.Description: Joyce has sailed to village once you're looking for instigator. She's talking to net picker about sailing. Extra content about village and why she sailed there. GREETING HERE!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'll just keep the Cor-de-Leite in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll just keep the Cor-de-Leite in the channel, if that's okay. It's too shallow near the pier..." She winds the mooring line around a post.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's good to see you here. I only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's good to see you here. I only just arrived myself."

fields.Title: You: ""Well, it was good running into you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, it was good running into you." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""What brings you here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What brings you here?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "...then secures the mooring line. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...then secures the mooring line. "It's good to see you here, detective. I only just arrived myself."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hmh... How *do* I like it?" She ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh... How *do* I like it?" She casts her gaze toward the village -- slush melting on the cinder blocks, construction work left half-finished ten years ago...

fields.Title: Authority: "What is this? Destruction of proper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is this? Destruction of property? Hooliganism? Elder abuse? And who is this *scamp*, anyway?

fields.Title: You: ""Oblivion -- that's so me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oblivion -- that's so me."

fields.Title: You: ""The place is doomed either way.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The place is doomed either way."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""The children carry them up. Come M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The children carry them up. Come May, the streets will be flooded..." Outside the wind rattles the loose hatches. "*Flooded* with cheap weapons. In angry hands."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, I'm not *frightened*, officer...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I'm not *frightened*, officer. I'd never..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Perhaps you shouldn't have. I sort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps you shouldn't have. I sort of liked it on her..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: You: ""This isola?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isola?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What brings you here, madam?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What brings you here, madam?"

fields.Title: You: ""So how do you like it here?" (Look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So how do you like it here?" (Look around.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Remind me to tell you one day." Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remind me to tell you one day." She corrects the scarf around her neck. "For now -- how can I assist you in this new location?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""They're antiques," says Lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're antiques," says Lieutenant John 'The Archetype' McCoy to his partner. "They're digging them up from the catacombs now, fixing them. Old caches from the Revolution. "

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Have I told you how they discovere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have I told you how they discovered this place?" The wind picks up, her raincoat flaps in the gust.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're not alone. Neither do most..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not alone. Neither do most of these people -- the literacy rate is around 45% west of the river. Fifty years of occupation have left these people in an *oblivion* of poverty."
fields.Alternate1: "Well, your condition has left you no worse off than most of these people -- the literacy rate is around 45% west of the river. Fifty years of occupation have left these people in an *oblivion* of poverty."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""So how do you like it here?" (Look..."]
Joyce Messier: ""It's just as well -- Lilienne and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just as well -- Lilienne and I are getting on much better. For one, she appreciates the concept of *rent*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That they don't..." She leans agai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That they don't..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh jetty, oh jetty...." she respon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh jetty, oh jetty...." she responds mournfully...

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like Cindy the SKULL alrigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like Cindy the SKULL alright. Want me to book her?"
fields.Alternate1: "Who is this *scamp*? Want me to look into it?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No need -- Lilienne and I are gett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need -- Lilienne and I are getting on much better. For one, she appreciates the concept of *rent*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hello, detectives." She fastens th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, detectives." She fastens the end of the line around the post and straightens her back.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""She could easily just..." She lean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She could easily just..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you, ma'am. Do keep an eye o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, ma'am. Do keep an eye on your boat."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No -- the Insulindian isola.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- the Insulindian isola."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "The woman is tying a complicated na..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman is tying a complicated nautical knot around the post.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do we?" He glances at his watch. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do we?" He glances at his watch. It doesn't look like he does.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing, really... I've had my eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, really... I've had my eye on this jetty for weeks now. So I decided to investigate it personally. This cluster of buildings isn't on any of the official maps, as far as I can tell."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It's early spring and the rains are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's early spring and the rains are coming. An officer enters a low hut of stone and wood. Inside, weapons are piled against the walls. Rifles with splintering stocks... and swords. Tens if not hundreds.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. Jetty. I prefer a good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. Jetty. I prefer a good jetty to a pier any day. Jet-jet-jetty..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Godspeed, detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Godspeed, detective."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me something else then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me something else then."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course -- how fortuitous that I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course -- how fortuitous that I'm so close at hand. What do you need?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "All right. Politics time. Let's *re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right. Politics time. Let's *react*.

fields.Title: You: ""J-j-j-jettady-jetty.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "J-j-j-jettady-jetty."

fields.Title: Drama: "Something about the way she says it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something about the way she says it makes you want to sing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She's tying a complicated nautical..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's tying a complicated nautical knot around the post.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I hear you have singled out a *sus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hear you have singled out a *suspect* and are in pursuit. This is cause for cautious optimism -- I would not want to delay you..."

fields.Title: You: ""This... fishing village?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This... fishing village?"

fields.Title: Logic: "That -- and she's also keeping an e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That -- and she's also keeping an eye on *you*.

fields.Title: You: ""Have you been spying on me?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you been spying on me?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""'Spying' has such a negative conno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Spying' has such a negative connotation. I did track your progress along the coast, however, and decided I would be better able to assist you from here..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Do you know how they discovered th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know how they discovered this place?" The wind picks up, her raincoat flaps in the gust.

fields.Title: You: ""I need your help with something, r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need your help with something, right away! No time to talk!"

fields.Title: Empathy: "You detect a note of longing in her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You detect a note of longing in her voice.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's pornographically poor. The st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's pornographically poor. The street has no name, all the men are dead or missing... and is that the carcass of a motor carriage over there?" She squints her eyes...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Maybe..." She leans against the ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Godspeed, detectives.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Godspeed, detectives."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I don't know how they discover..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I don't know how they discovered it."
fields.Alternate1: "No, you haven't told me how they found it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then there's the matter of that li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then there's the matter of that little scamp in old-lady clothes. She threatened to paint the Cor-de-Leite red. Like blood, you see. Well, I like it the way it is -- white."

fields.Title: You: ""That's just Cindy being Cindy. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just Cindy being Cindy. You can ignore her."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm surprised that woman hasn't pu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm surprised that woman hasn't put me to the sword yet. Maybe she will? You should ask your questions while you can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So am I -- and I *do* know how to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So am I -- and I *do* know how to use one..." She leans against the railing, looking up at the grey sky.

fields.Title: You: ""Don't worry. I got her sword." (Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry. I got her sword." (Show it.)

fields.Title: You: ""What is an isola, exactly?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is an isola, exactly?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "Above you there forms a quilt of al..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Of course. I hear you have singled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I hear you have singled out a *suspect* and are in pursuit -- this is cause for cautious optimism. How can I help you at this juncture?"

fields.Title: You: ""She's a woman. She doesn't know ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's a woman. She doesn't know how to use a sword."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Their cloud shadows slide over the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Their cloud shadows slide over the ruins of Revachol West -- wherever they pass, the temperature drops slightly but perceptibly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fortunately for you, madam, the RC..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fortunately for you, madam, the RCM is on the scene."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: "Leave it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave it be.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right to be scared. This is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right to be scared. This is all your fault."

fields.Title: You: ""You're in no danger." (Whisper) "T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're in no danger." (Whisper) "The working class have no idea what's happening to them."

fields.Title: Authority: "Real men, real politics, real thoug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Real men, real politics, real thoughts in your head!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "You leave her fastening the mooring..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You leave her fastening the mooring line around the post rotting in the water.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Water drips down eaves of eternite...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Water drips down eaves of eternite. The jetty below her feet creaks to the tune.

fields.Title: You: ""Try not to be scared. This is just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Try not to be scared. This is just how the *real* city looks."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "This story she will tell only befor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This story she will tell only before she *leaves* Martinaise. At the very end of her stay.

fields.Title: Lilienne, the Net Picker: ""Aye, ma'am... And it's a jetty, by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aye, ma'am... And it's a jetty, by the way."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm guessing you *don't* know then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm guessing you *don't* know then..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No matter -- Lilienne and I are ge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No matter -- Lilienne and I are getting on much better. For one, she appreciates the concept of *rent*."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The smell of salt and dog shit in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smell of salt and dog shit in the background.

fields.Title: Authority: "What is this? Destruction of proper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is this? Destruction of property? Hooliganism? Elder abuse?

fields.Title: You: ""This island?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This island?"

fields.Title: You: ""Hello, ma'am.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, ma'am."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "The woman is tying a complicated na..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman is tying a complicated nautical knot around the post, while occasionally exchanging a few words with the other woman.
fields.Alternate1: The woman is tying a complicated nautical knot around the post while occasionally exchanging a few words with Lilienne, the Net Picker.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- Insulinde.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- Insulinde."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hello, detective." She fastens the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, detective." She fastens the end of the line around the post and straightens her back.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...maybe there is something else I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...maybe there is something else I can assist you with? While you're *hot* in pursuit?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Above you there forms a quilt of al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Above you there forms a quilt of altocumulus clouds, twisting into each other. The wind tugs and stretches them over the bay.

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me now, I have time.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me now, I have time."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "...then secures the mooring line. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...then secures the mooring line. "It's good to see you here, detectives. I only just arrived myself."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I knew you would sympathize." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew you would sympathize." She nods. "Most Revacholians will never know what this place means, our home -- this island of matter. Or why they were ferried over in the first place..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a pity. Most of these people..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a pity. Most of these people will never know what this place means -- this island of matter. Or why they were ferried over in the first place..."

fields.Title: You: ""Forty-five percent is around where..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forty-five percent is around where I operate. Things are getting better though."

fields.Title: Lilienne, the Net Picker: "Dark eyes survey the coast leading..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dark eyes survey the coast leading up to Martinaise. Dull grey metal rests in her scabbard -- a sword. The wind is too loud for her to hear...
